articles.description: The Welsh side were competitive in the opening quarter but their evening soon turned into another miserable one
articles.content:
The Dragons were thrashed 51-3 by the Sharks in Durban as they conceded three yellow cards and lost Ross Moriarty to a serious injury. 
The Welsh side showed up well in the opening quarter. The welc… [+3267 chars]
